verses.content: Chun, Job chun a dawn a, a hril tah a:
“Thilthawtheina nei naw mi chu i va ṭhangpui hlak de! Kut hrâtna nei naw chu i va sanhim hlak de!
Varna nei naw chu i hril var a; Hrietna indiktak chu huntâwk zetin i hrilfie a!
Chuong thuhai chu tuin am ân hriltir che a na? Nangmaa inthawka suok chu tu thlarau am a na?
A thi tahai chu an inthin a, Tuihai le chutaka umhai hnuoia chun.
Ama hmaa chun Seol chu saruok a nih, Sietna khawm chun silfên a nei nawh.
Hmun ruok chunga chun hmârtieng chu a keiphar a, Leihnuoi chu iengkhawm nilo chungah a khai bawk a,
Tuihai chu a sûm sâtakhai chun a fûn khâwm a, An hnuoia chun sûm chu ân ek si nawh a.
A lalṭhungpha hmai chu ân khum a, A chunga chun a sûm chu ân zâmtir a.
Tuihai chunga chun ramri a riruong a, Sûn le zân tâwp chinhaia le chun.
Vân banhai chu an inthinin, A kâwknaa chun mak an tih a.
A thilthawtheinain tuisuoriet chu a sukreh a, A hrietthiemna chun Rahab chu a sukthlûk bawk a;
A thuok chun vânhai chu cheimawiin a um a; A kut chun rûlpui intawl lai chu a sunthleng tah a.
En ta u, hi hi hman hi a lampuihai a ṭhen chau chu a na, A chanchin chu ei va hriet tlâwm lâwm lâwm ngei de! Nisienlakhawm, a thilthawtheina rihâu chu tuin am hrethiem thei a ta?” tiin.
